repo_sapiens

hello-python-test-shireadmin

A simple hello world package for testing Python package distribution.

repo_sapiens.greet(name: str | None = None) → None[source]

Print a greeting message.

Parameters:

name – Optional name to greet. Defaults to “World” if not provided.

Examples

>>> greet()
Hello, World!
>>> greet("Python")
Hello, Python!
repo_sapiens.get_greeting(name: str = 'World') → str[source]

Generate a greeting message string.

Parameters:

name – The name to include in the greeting. Defaults to “World”.

Returns:

A greeting message string.

Examples

>>> get_greeting()
'Hello, World!'
>>> get_greeting("Python")
'Hello, Python!'
